block.p: PORPORA-Judith (nee Schroeder). Age 51, of Cold Spring Harbor. Suddenly on September 9, 2000. Beloved wife of Stephen, loving mother of Devon and Mairin. Cherished daughter of Peggy and George Schroeder, dear sister of Sandra Schroeder. Visitation on Tuesday 2-5 and 7-9PM, at M.A. Connell Funeral Home, 934 New York Avenue, Huntington. Mass of Christian Burial, on Wednesday 9:45AM, St. Patrick's R.C. Church. Interment St. Patrick's cemetery. In lieu of flowers donations to the Judi Porpora Scholarship Fund, in care of Cold Spring Harbor High School, 82 Turkey Lane, Cold Spring Harbor, NY 11724, Attention Marty Rowley are appreciated.
